nodes.bodyText:
why is this removed? it is not on the referred ES state https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/blame/704317da71c3de1b85679bc549bba3b4230acb5d/test/framework/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/cluster/ESAllocationTestCase.java#L228
Seems like this could result in wrong behaviour.
Good pick, i took it from the wrong point-of-time (head). My mistake. Thanks.
I merged it already in the commit.
